Title: Requires all individuals pawning goods to present identification and for pawnbrokers to keep records of such person
Summary: Requires all individuals pawning goods to present two forms of identification and for pawnbrokers to keep records of such person; requires pawnbrokers to report new goods within 24 hours of their receipt to the sheriff and they may not be sold or destroyed for 15 days; also requires the sheriff to compile a list of goods stolen within the county.
LawCode: Add ยง46-a, Gen Bus L; amd ยง650, County L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the county law, in relation to the registration of goods presented to pawnbrokers with the sheriff's department
